title: ADCs should not always be the center of the game and only relevant late game damage.
body:
Look at this garbage. Why should this game so heavily enforce one champion always being the center of the game and being the only relevant late game damage?

There are no words for this. It's just disgusting.

RIOT literally changed GA specifically to give it to ADCs. . . And guess fucking what?  ADCs use the damn item.

In fact, almost all ADCs have it as one of their absolute highest winrate items, and for ***literally ALL of them*** it is their ***MOST COMMONLY PURCHASED 'End Item"*** 

Cait, exact same thing, with a higher nominal purchase rate to boot, but a 59.5% winrate instead.

Even Corki builds it as his most common "End Game" item, and reaps a 62.8% winrate with it, despite not even being a bot lane ADC.

Want to guess what Ezreal, Draven and Graves most common end items is?  Its fucking GA with a 61.7% winrate each.

Jhin too, you wonder?  You betchya, but only a 60% winrate. 

That new bitch Kai'sa?  Rocking a 65.8% winrate with that GA.

Kog, Kalista, even Kindred (with a massive 67.3% winrate with it I should add) who has similar functionality on her ult, still buy it more often than literally any other item past their core build. 

Don't forget Twitch, Varus, Vayne and yes, even fucking Quinn.

Outside of boots, and a three item core, GA is built ***ON EVERY SINGLE ADC MORE THAN ANY OTHER ITEM.  PERIOD.  THEY ALL RECEIVE BETWEEN A 55% AND 67.3% WINRATE WITH SAID ITEM***

To claim otherwise is to outright lie.  I would expect far more from a mod on the forums they are supposed to moderate.

Instead of looking at win rates, look at pick rates.

You know, the things that actually say whether or not an item is built.

Utility/CC mages are not enchanters.  Damage dealing is part of their role.
The same goes for battle mages.

I actually think the mages would be relatively balanced if the marksmen were taken down a several notches.

Not what their purpose was in these games. How Olaf and Trundle build pure tank with no actual damage, Morgana  was primarily for CC/Black shield, Orianna was there to be a lategame supportive mid-laner with utility around shockwave. Galio, while he did go full damage, was only meant to blow up squishies while still providing CC and frontline.

Ezreal and Caitlyn were shredding tanks who went back, regenned, and then frontlined again only to also get shredded again. These damage numbers were highly padded and in the end didn't mean too much in the grand scheme of things.

Elaborating on how something occurs does not necessarily demonstrate that it occurring is beneficial or justifiable.  How the game should be balanced will necessarily fall to subjective opinion because there are multiple "correct balance outcomes" that will shape different metas for a reasonably playable and balanced League.  Because there are multiple ways the game can be balanced while still being fun, the best choice is probably to encourage a meta which is fairly flexible with many diverse playstyles/options so that it doesn't quickly become stale and then to gradually create change so that it doesn't cement into a more rigid/restrictive meta.

Back to the point at hand, it is many players' **opinion **that the distribution of damage output is not ideal and a meta that encourages a formula of 1xmarksman+1xsupport+3xpseudo-supports detracts from the game.  So stating, "those stats are only like that because of the meta" and then explaining the meta, does not counter other players stating that they are unhappy with the meta and that the stats highlight some of the common complaints about the current meta.  Also, because the ADC marksman has long been the only truly mandatory role, it can also be easily argued that this current meta is just an exaggerated form of an extremely long-lasting and stale aspect of the meta.
